FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='date_cmp',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='date1',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='date1',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['t_date'],
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='date2',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='date2',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['t_date'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='date_cmp',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='!=',
              left=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='date1',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='annee',
                    )
                )
              right=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='date2',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='annee',
                    )
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='-',
                      left=
                        StructRef(
                          type='.',
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='date1',
                            )
                          field=
                            ID(
                              name='annee',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        StructRef(
                          type='.',
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='date2',
                            )
                          field=
                            ID(
                              name='annee',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='!=',
              left=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='date1',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='mois',
                    )
                )
              right=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='date2',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='mois',
                    )
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='-',
                      left=
                        StructRef(
                          type='.',
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='date1',
                            )
                          field=
                            ID(
                              name='mois',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        StructRef(
                          type='.',
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='date2',
                            )
                          field=
                            ID(
                              name='mois',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[2]=
        Return(
          expr=
            BinaryOp(
              op='-',
              left=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='date1',
                    )
                  field=
                    ID(
                      name='jour',
                    )
                )
              right=
                StructRef(
                  type='.',

                    ID(
                      name='date2',

)

FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='date_set_date',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='date',

                      quals=[],

                        TypeDecl(
                          declname='date',
                          quals=[],

                          type=

                              names=['t_date'],
                            )

                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='jour',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='jour',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[2]=
                Decl(
                  name='mois',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='mois',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[3]=
                Decl(
                  name='annee',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='annee',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='date_set_date',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        If(
          cond=
            FuncCall(
              name=
                ID(
                  name='date_valide',
                )
              args=
                ExprList(
                  exprs[0]=
                    ID(
                      name='jour',
                    )
                  exprs[1]=
                    ID(
                      name='mois',
                    )
                  exprs[2]=
                    ID(
                      name='annee',
                    )
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Assignment(
                  op='=',
                  lvalue=
                    StructRef(
                      type='->',
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='date',
                        )
                      field=
                        ID(
                          name='jour',
                        )
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    ID(
                      name='jour',
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                Assignment(
                  op='=',
                  lvalue=
                    StructRef(
                      type='->',
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='date',
                        )
                      field=
                        ID(
                          name='mois',
                        )
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    ID(
                      name='mois',
                    )
                )
              block_items[2]=
                Assignment(
                  op='=',
                  lvalue=
                    StructRef(
                      type='->',
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='date',
                        )
                      field=
                        ID(
                          name='annee',
                        )
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    ID(
                      name='annee',
                    )
                )
              block_items[3]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='1',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
    )
)

FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='est_bissextile',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='annee',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='annee',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='est_bissextile',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='||',
              left=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='&&',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='%',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='annee',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='4',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='0',
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='!=',
                      left=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='%',
                          left=
                            ID(
                              name='annee',
                            )
                          right=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='100',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='0',
                        )
                    )
                )
              right=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='==',
                  left=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='%',
                      left=
                        ID(
                          name='annee',
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='400',
                        )
                    )
                  right=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='0',
                    )
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='1',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
    )
)

FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='max_jours_mois',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='mois',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='mois',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='annee',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='annee',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='max_jours_mois',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        Switch(
          cond=
            ID(
              name='mois',
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='AVRIL',
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='JUIN',
                    )
                )
              block_items[2]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='SEPTEMBRE',
                    )
                )
              block_items[3]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='NOVEMBRE',
                    )
                  stmts[0]=
                    Return(
                      expr=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='30',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[4]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='JANVIER',
                    )
                )
              block_items[5]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='MARS',
                    )
                )
              block_items[6]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='MAI',
                    )
                )
              block_items[7]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='JUILLET',
                    )
                )
              block_items[8]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='AOUT',
                    )
                )
              block_items[9]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='OCTOBRE',
                    )
                )
              block_items[10]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='DECEMBRE',
                    )
                  stmts[0]=
                    Return(
                      expr=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='31',
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[11]=
                Case(
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='FEVRIER',
                    )
                  stmts[0]=
                    Return(
                      expr=
                        TernaryOp(
                          cond=
                            FuncCall(
                              name=
                                ID(
                                  name='est_bissextile',
                                )
                              args=
                                ExprList(
                                  exprs[0]=
                                    ID(
                                      name='annee',
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                          iftrue=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='29',
                            )
                          iffalse=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='28',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[12]=
                Default(
                  stmts[0]=
                    Return(
                      expr=
                        UnaryOp(
                          op='-',
                          expr=
                            Constant(
                              type='int',
                              value='1',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )
)

FuncDef(
  decl=
    Decl(
      name='date_valide',
      quals=[],
      align=[],
      storage=[],
      funcspec=[],
      type=
        FuncDecl(
          args=
            ParamList(
              params[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='jour',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='jour',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[1]=
                Decl(
                  name='mois',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='mois',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
              params[2]=
                Decl(
                  name='annee',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='annee',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          type=
            TypeDecl(
              declname='date_valide',
              quals=[],
              align=None,
              type=
                IdentifierType(
                  names=['int'],
                )
            )
        )
    )
  body=
    Compound(
      block_items[0]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='&&',
              left=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='>=',
                  left=
                    ID(
                      name='jour',
                    )
                  right=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='1',
                    )
                )
              right=
                BinaryOp(
                  op='<=',
                  left=
                    ID(
                      name='jour',
                    )
                  right=
                    FuncCall(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='max_jours_mois',
                        )
                      args=
                        ExprList(
                          exprs[0]=
                            ID(
                              name='mois',
                            )
                          exprs[1]=
                            ID(
                              name='annee',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Return(
                  expr=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='1',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[1]=
        Return(
          expr=
            Constant(
              type='int',
              value='0',
            )
        )
    )
)

          type=
            PtrDecl(
              quals=[],
              type=
                PtrDecl(

                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='machines',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['t_machine'],
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[5]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='printf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"Combien de machines? "',
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[6]=
        FuncCall(
          name=
            ID(
              name='scanf',
            )
          args=
            ExprList(
              exprs[0]=
                Constant(
                  type='string',
                  value='"%i"',
                )
              exprs[1]=
                UnaryOp(
                  op='&',
                  expr=
                    ID(
                      name='nb_machines',
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[7]=
        Assignment(
          op='=',
          lvalue=
            ID(
              name='machines',
            )
          rvalue=
            Cast(
              to_type=
                Typename(
                  name=None,
                  quals=[],
                  align=None,
                  type=
                    PtrDecl(
                      quals=[],
                      type=
                        PtrDecl(
                          quals=[],
                          type=
                            TypeDecl(
                              declname=None,
                              quals=[],
                              align=None,
                              type=
                                IdentifierType(
                                  names=['t_machine'],
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              expr=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='malloc',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        BinaryOp(
                          op='*',
                          left=
                            UnaryOp(
                              op='sizeof',
                              expr=
                                Typename(
                                  name=None,
                                  quals=[],
                                  align=None,
                                  type=
                                    PtrDecl(
                                      quals=[],
                                      type=
                                        TypeDecl(
                                          declname=None,

                                          type=
                                            IdentifierType(

                                            )

                                    )
                                )
                            )
                          right=
                            ID(
                              name='nb_machines',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[8]=
        If(
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='==',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='machines',
                )
              right=
                Constant(
                  type='int',
                  value='0',
                )
            )
          iftrue=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                FuncCall(
                  name=
                    ID(
                      name='printf',
                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=

                          value='"Erreur d\'allocation!\\n"',

              block_items[1]=

                  name=

                    )
                  args=
                    ExprList(
                      exprs[0]=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='1',
                        )
                    )
                )
            )
        )
      block_items[9]=
        For(
          init=
            DeclList(
              decls[0]=
                Decl(
                  name='i',
                  quals=[],
                  align=[],
                  storage=[],
                  funcspec=[],
                  type=
                    TypeDecl(
                      declname='i',
                      quals=[],
                      align=None,
                      type=
                        IdentifierType(
                          names=['int'],
                        )
                    )
                  init=
                    Constant(
                      type='int',
                      value='0',
                    )
                )
            )
          cond=
            BinaryOp(
              op='<',
              left=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )
              right=
                ID(
                  name='nb_machines',
                )
            )
          next=
            UnaryOp(
              op='p++',
              expr=
                ID(
                  name='i',
                )
            )
          stmt=
            Compound(
              block_items[0]=
                Assignment(
                  op='=',
                  lvalue=
                    ArrayRef(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='machines',
                        )
                      subscript=
                        ID(
                          name='i',
                        )
                    )
                  rvalue=
                    FuncCall(
                      name=
                        ID(
                          name='machine_init',
                        )
                      args=
                        ExprList(
                          exprs[0]=
                            ID(
                              name='i',
                            )
                          exprs[1]=
                            Constant(
                              type='string',
                              value='"R678S45"',
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
              block_items[1]=
                If(
                  cond=
                    BinaryOp(
                      op='==',
                      left=
                        ArrayRef(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='machines',
                            )
                          subscript=
                            ID(
                              name='i',
                            )
                        )
                      right=
                        Constant(
                          type='int',
                          value='0',
                        )
                    )
                  iftrue=
                    Compound(
                      block_items[0]=
                        FuncCall(
                          name=
                            ID(
                              name='printf',
                            )
                          args=
                            ExprList(
                              exprs[0]=
                                Constant(
                                  type='string',
                                  value='"Desole vous êtes limite à %i machines"',
                                )
                              exprs[1]=
                                ID(
